body:
We've built and released our fourth betting Model in 2021, and hopefully, you've been enjoying it throughout the **Australian Open Predictions**. This Model, developed by one of the sharpest sports betting data scientists in the industry, ingests dozens of tennis data sources to create probabilities for every tournament. From backyard ATP events to the Grand Slams. It distinguishes surfaces too. So Rafa is going to have a different rating on clay than he is on the Australian Open hardcourt. We'll go into further details in the future, but let's stop wasting time and start reading the **Australian Open Predictions**. They'll populate every day of the tournament. You'll notice that there can be significant differences of opinion. Like when Su-Wei Hsieh was rated as the favorite vs Markéta Vondroušová, but the market was +200 ($3.00). Hsieh won in straight sets! They don't always go that well but it's one of dozens of examples of why you should be checking our Australian Open Predictions as part of your research. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Predictions** Men's FInal outputs coming soon.
- - -
Want the **best odds on tennis**? **Join the world's biggest sportsbook.** **JOIN BET365. NOW.**
